results.name: Denominator of 2^n*(3*n-3)!/( ((n-1)!)^3 * (2*n)! ).
reference: Valtr, Pavel; The probability that n random points in a triangle are in convex position. Combinatorica 16 (1996), no. 4, 567-573.
